Classes in mb.web used by mb.tictactoe.data

          Server for TicTacToe game.
WebThreadServerClient
          Sub-thread created by WebThreadServer in case any connection comes.
Xmlable
          Superclass of any object that is convertable to XML.
XmlTree
          Representation of XML message with use of tree, where single node can have dtd, name, value, unlimited attributes and unlimited children, of which every is also a node with the same properties.
 

Classes in mb.web used by mb.web
StreamPipe
          Pipe of streams that contains two sides, both have inputs and outputs.
StreamReceiver
          Used by application to receive input.
StreamSender
          Used by application to send output.
StreamSide
          One side of the stream, contains input and output, and when connected to another side, input connects with output on the other side, and output connects to input from other side.
WebThread
          Extension of Thread class, that stores basic data used for networking.
WebThreadClient
          Abstract parent of server-side client and remote client.
WebThreadServer
          Server for TicTacToe game.
WebThreadServerClient
          Sub-thread created by WebThreadServer in case any connection comes.
Xmlable
          Superclass of any object that is convertable to XML.
XmlReceiver
          Receives XML files.
XmlSender
          Sends XML messages.
XmlTree
          Representation of XML message with use of tree, where single node can have dtd, name, value, unlimited attributes and unlimited children, of which every is also a node with the same properties.
